name: Spheroid Prime
description:
Spheroid Prime is a game where you control a spaceship defending against an invasion from another dimension, with nothing but a shield, the ability to self-destruct and an anti-laser system. Shoot'em up,  without shooting!

- Features 4 levels and a boss.

- Move with the mouse.

- Shield with left click.

- While shielding, rotate with the mouse.

- Self-destruct with space.

-  Remove all lasers with Ctrl.

- Pause the game with Escape.

Featuring "Water" by Sim Gretina: https://soundcloud.com/simgretina/water

Font is Bebas Neue: https://www.dafont.com/bebas-neue.font
